name: ui5-antares
description: UI5 Antares is a set of some useful classes and methods to speed up the development time for OData operations in SAPUI5 applications.

scripts.build: ui5 build preload --clean-dest --config ui5-npm.yaml --exclude-task=minify && npm run move-declaration
scripts.move-declaration: shx cp dist/index.d.ts dist/resources/ui5/antares && shx rm dist/index.d.ts

author: Hasan Çiftçi (hasanciftcii26@gmail.com)
